summary: The Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) course is a prestigious training program in the field of information security and cybersecurity. The course covers a wide range of topics, including Security and Risk Management, Asset Security, Security Architecture and Engineering, Communication and Network Security, Identity and Access Management (IAM), Security Assessment and Testing, Security Operations, and Software Development Security. The course is hybrid, conducted both on the Bar-Ilan University campus and simultaneously via Zoom. It consists of 10 sessions, each lasting 5 academic hours, for a total of 50 academic hours. Classes are held on Sundays and Wednesdays from 17:30 to 21:30. The course begins on November 13, 2024. Prerequisites include five years of experience in the field and an interview with an academic advisor. The program is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academy in Israel.

COURSE NAME: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP).

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course is a prestigious training program in the field of information security and cybersecurity. It is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academy in Israel. The program aims to prepare participants for the CISSP certification, recognized globally in the cybersecurity industry.

TARGET AUDIENCE: This course is designed for professionals with experience in the field of information security and cybersecurity who are looking to enhance their knowledge and obtain the CISSP certification.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: Not specified in the provided text.

PREREQUISITES: Participants must have five years of experience in the field and must attend a consultation with an academic advisor.

CERTIFICATIONS: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP).

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 13.11.2024.
- Schedule: Sundays and Wednesdays, from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Duration: 10 sessions.
- Academic Hours: 50 hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes are conducted on-campus at Bar-Ilan University and simultaneously via Zoom.

TUITION AND FEES: Not specified in the provided text.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Security and Risk Management.
- Asset Security.
- Security Architecture and Engineering.
- Communication and Network Security.
- Identity and Access Management (IAM).
- Security Assessment and Testing.
- Security Operations.
- Software Development Security.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an admission interview and register, contact: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academy in Israel. The institution is dedicated to providing specialized programs in high-tech and cybersecurity.
